summary: A collection of custom Qt widget classes that form the graphical user interface of the TagStudio application, offering reusable components for interactive labels, thumbnails, media playback, tag visualization, progress reporting, data migration dialogs, and preview panels to facilitate browsing, editing, and managing media items.
business_intent: Provide end‑users with an intuitive desktop UI for organizing, tagging, previewing, and controlling media assets, while giving developers ready‑made, theme‑aware Qt components to accelerate feature implementation and improve user productivity.
